channel.title: EOTLM Alerts - KAIROS D27 Archive
channel.description: Fragments retrieved from the 2090 Helion archive. Critical signals from the edge of collapse.

item.title: D27 // Atlantic Heat Pulse Detected
item.description:
Alert: Abnormal thermal surge detected in North Atlantic gyre.
Projected impact: Marine ecosystem destabilisation, increased coastal storm risk.
"If the ocean forgets how to breathe, so do we."

item.title: D27 // Signal Degraded: Lattice Integrity Failing
item.description:
System Integrity: Pulsepoint D27 reporting progressive network collapse across Eurasian nodes.
Residents report persistent power outages and supply chain rationing.
"History repeats itself for those who can still remember."

item.title: D27 // Mass Coral Bleaching Event - Indo-Pacific
item.description:
Event: Severe coral bleaching event confirmed by satellite and drone sweep.
Food security warning issued for 320 million at-risk inhabitants.
"Collapse travels fastest along invisible lines."

item.title: D27 // Archive Note: Untrained Voices
item.description:
Recovered fragment:
"We marked time in sunsets and shutdowns. The lattice was all we had left--until it went quiet."

item.title: D27 // Black Sky Notice: Solar Disruption
item.description:
Emergency: Planetary geomagnetic storm imminent. Prepare for blackout protocols.
All comms to backup lattice.
"Darkness comes quick. Make every signal count."
